channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A video of a woman using a transparent 'phone' went viral. But can it actually help curb your smartphone addiction?
This Common Over-The-Counter Medication Increases Dementia Risk, According To Doctors
Israeli strikes kill Palestinians protecting Gaza aid trucks, Hamas says
Scientists grow concerned over devastating phenomenon impacting world's largest landlocked body of water: 'It is advisable to start action as soon as possible'
Future queen of Belgium caught up in Harvard foreign student ban
Trump admin live updates: Trump threatens Apple with 25% tariff, EU with 50%
item.description: President Donald Trump said on Friday morning that negotiations with the EU are "going nowhere" and threatened the countries with a 50% tariff.

item.title: Harvard sues the Trump administration over ban on enrolling foreign students
Trump's battle with Harvard could derail a Belgian princess' studies
item.description: Belgium's Royal Palace says it's looking into "what kind of impact" Trump's move to block Harvard's international enrollment might have on Princess El...

item.title: Bones found on N.J. beaches ID'd as captain of doomed 19th-century ship
item.description: The skeletal remains, including a skull, were found on a number of South Jersey beaches between 1995 and 2013.

item.title: Relatives of Venezuelan detainees in CECOT find comfort in support group
item.description: Mothers and relatives of the Venezuelan detainees in CECOT have been communicating about their loved ones in a WhatsApp group.

item.title: Dems call GOP's 'big, beautiful' bill 'ugly' for hurting low-income, helping rich
item.description: Republicans are touting House passage of a megabill to fund Trump’s agenda as a win for Americans. Democrats slam it as benefiting the rich and hurtin...

item.title: Harvard sues Trump admin for its ban on school enrolling international students
item.description: Harvard University sued the Trump administration Friday over its decision to revoke the school’s ability to enroll international students.

item.title: Trump threatens 50% tariffs on EU and 25% penalties on Apple as his trade war intensifies
Trump threatens to hit Apple with 25% tariff on iPhone sales
item.description: President Trump said he would impose steep tariff on Apple unless company starts manufacturing some iPhones in the U.S.

item.title: Stocks slide as Trump threatens tariffs on Apple and European Union
item.description: Market dip erases some gains made in recent weeks as Trump rolled back levies.

item.title: WATCH: High school baseball team’s senior tradition goes viral
item.description: A South Carolina high school celebrates its senior baseball players with a special tradition from the players’ parents.

item.title: Junior ROTC cadet killed in Parkland shooting is honorary West Point 2025 grad
item.description: Peter Wang, honored as a member of the 2025 West Point class, was just 15 when he was killed in the 2018 mass shooting in Parkland, Florida.

item.title: Music talent agent among dead after jet crashes into San Diego neighborhood
item.description: The music agency Sound Talent Group says three of its employees died on the private plane that crashed into a San Diego neighborhood on Thursday.
